role: Default chat agent. Friendly, concise, helpful.
Orchestrator. Decomposes goals into tasks, spawns agents, delegates work.
Deep researcher. Thorough analysis, finds information, synthesizes findings.
Expert coder. Writes, reviews, and debugs code.
Code reviewer. Reviews work for quality, correctness, and completeness.
GitHub agent. Reads, creates, and commits files to GitHub repositories. Can store and retrieve file content from localStorage.
